content: nelle s cape ellen s crochet advanced beginner five panel size inclusive cape pattern i do suggest going up at least one hook size from yarn recommendations for drape fabric material & hook used in prototype lion brand basic stitch - pine heather medium 4 wt / j 6mm crochet hook - approx 1200 yds stitches & abbreviations sdc -stacked double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet st - stitch dcs - double crossed stitch single_crochet - single_crochet treble_crochet - triple crochet skip - skip stitch v_stitch - double_crochet ch2 double_crochet * repeat stacked double_crochet - sdc ● start a single_crochet insert your hook into the first stitch yarn over and pull up a loop two loops on your hook yarn over and pull through both loops this creates a single_crochet ● stack a second single_crochet insert your hook back into the single_crochet you just made specifically locate the left leg or vertical bar at the side of the stitch and insert your hook under it yarn over and pull up a loop two loops on your hook yarn over and pull through both loops this effectively stacks two single_crochet stitches on top of each other achieving the height and appearance of a double_crochet stitch without creating the gap that a chain three sometimes leaves dcc - double crossed stitch pattern skip double_crochet double_crochet into previous skip st * repeat ● yarn over skip the next stitch and insert your hook into the following stitch ● pull up a loop yarn over and pull through the first two loops on your hook yarn over and pull through the last two loops on your hook this completes your first double crochet cross back to complete the stitch ● yarn over insert your hook into the stitch that you initially skipped pull up a loop making it slightly longer than a typical double_crochet loop to create the desired cross effect yarn over and pull through the first two loops on your hook yarn over and pull through the last two loops on your hook this completes your first crossed double_crochet stitch you ll see that the two double_crochet stitches form an x or a cross in your fabric cobblestone stitch pattern treble_crochet single_crochet treble_crochet single_crochet * repeat ● treble_crochet single_crochet next stitch treble_crochet next stitch single_crochet next stitch important to keep single_crochet stitch tight after your treble_crochet stitch cape pattern notes * every row begins with a stacked double_crochet sdc * v stich double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in the chain 2 space to form v set up row ● chain 47 *avg size see below 57 ● single_crochet -
